Introduction
This topic contains information about evaluating evidence in claims related to personal trauma, including
general information on personal trauma
importance of obtaining and analyzing available evidence of personal trauma
alternative sources of evidence of in-service personal trauma
evidence that may constitute a marker of personal trauma
interpretation of behavioral changes as markers of personal trauma
military sexual trauma (MST) during inactive dutyÂ training (IADT)
training and signature requirements for MST decisions
, and
rating decision requirements for claims based on MST
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section E - Evidence Evaluation and Decisions for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Claims Related to Personal Trauma
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section E
